Source: Reuters

Description: U.S. full year trade data is expected on Tuesday and will likely show a shortfall in China's purchase commitments. Wall Street closed on a choppy trading day Monday, as Investors digested recent results from megacaps. Peleton reports on Tuesday and is expected to have suffered a loss as demand for at-home fitness equipment sinks. Its stock was riding high on Monday on reports of buyout interest from Amazon and Nike.
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3JalpAt
